description: A scholarship for cool students attending UIC
requirement: Must be attending UIC, must be cool, must have some form of financial need, must have at least a 3.0 GPA

description: The Fearless Undocumented Alliance at UIC is offering up to $5,000 of rewards for undocumented students at UIC.
requirement: Must be an undocumented undergraduate or graduate student at UIC, Must have at least a 3.0 GPA, Must have at least 1 letter of recommendation.

award_name: The Aga Khan Foundation International Scholarship
description: The Aga Khan Foundation International Scholarship provides scholarships to students from select developing countries who have no other source of financial help for their graduate studies. The scholarships are 50 percent grant and 50 percent loan.
requirement: The main criteria for selecting award winners are: l) consistently excellent academic records, 2) genuine financial need, 3) admission to a highly reputable university or programme of study

description: Yale University Scholarship is a fully funded scholarship for international students. This scholarship is offered for undergraduate, masters and PhD.
requirement: Must be a  undergraduate, masters or PhD student at Yale University.

description: This scholarship applies to Hispanic students who are beginning or continuing their studies at higher educational institutions in Arizona and California's Central Valley
requirement: Eligible applicants must: demonstrate leadership in extra-curricular activities, a commitment to volunteer service in the community and financial need; be an incoming or continuing full-time undergraduate student full-time; have a 3.0 GPA; be a U.S. Citizen, Permanent Legal Resident, Undocumented, DACA, CA Dreamer or Eligible Non-Citizen (as defined by FAFSA); and, must be a resident and attending a college in Arizona or California's Central Valley (see website for more details).
